name: Challenges
description:
Come to the Challenges battle arena and defeat as many Bosses as possible to get a lot of glory!! Use different weapons, each weapon is a different strategy, come and enjoy this adventure!

How to play?

  • Dash: Right Mouse button
  • Shoot/Attack: Left mouse button
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Move: WASD or Arrow keys

Filter interpretation

  • Primary Color: 
    • Change body color
    • Change environment color
       
  • Secondary Color: 
    • Change weapon color
       
  • Head: 
    • Change Head
  • Body: 
    • Change body

  • Origin:

Mundane 

Knife
Melee Weapon:
Kitchen knife, be careful, it is very dangerous. Machine Gun
Ranged Weapon:
War machine gun, with a three-shot crack confers considerable damage.

Technology 

Sword Tech 
Melee Weapon:
Sword that with each blow dealt to an enemy creates a powerful electrical discharge.
Taser
Ranged Weapon:
Stun gun that launches electrical projectiles, which when colliding with an enemy creates a powerful electrical discharge.

Magic

Magic Staff
Melee Weapon:
Staff magician that launches projectiles that stay in the air, and after a while they quickly advance, inflicting magic damage on the enemy.
Magic Sword
Ranged Weapon:
Sword that launches blows of magical power, which go in the direction of the given blow.

Holy

Mace
Melee Weapon:
Gladiator's mace, a spinning ball of spikes delivering a mighty impact.
Saber
Ranged Weapon:
Launch your lightsaber at enemies like a boomerang.

Cursed

Cursed Bone
Melee Weapon:
Cursed bone where each hit on the enemy applies poison
Cursed Staff
Ranged Weapon:
Cursed staff where each projectile hit on the enemy applies poison.

Natural 

Spear
Melee Weapon:
Powerful spear where touching the enemy with it causes damage because of its spikes.
Bow
Ranged Weapon:
Bow with fast and powerful arrows.
